description: Mentioned only by Irwin in a list of mixture stops under the heading �Color Due to Stop-Pitches�, with no definition. From the name we may infer that it is a cross between a Terzian and a Scharf.
examplesDescription: Terzianscharf III-IV, Schwellwerk; Liebfrauendom, Munich, Germany; Zeilhuber 1957. This is the only known example.

examples.name: Terzianscharf III-IV, Schwellwerk; Liebfrauendom, Munich, Germany; Zeilhuber 1957. This is the only known example.
